trans-unit.target: Retourneert de melding van de <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted"> </xref> gebeurtenis.

trans-unit.source: An instance of SpeakStartedEventArgs is created when the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> event.
trans-unit.target: Een exemplaar van SpeakStartedEventArgs wordt gemaakt wanneer de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>object verhoogt de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>gebeurtenis.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> event when it begins speaking a prompt using any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>verhoogt de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>gebeurtenis wanneer deze begint met een opdrachtprompt met behulp van een spreken de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>methoden.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: The SpeakStartedEventArgs class has no properties, and does not return data from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> event.
trans-unit.target: De klasse SpeakStartedEventArgs heeft geen eigenschappen en retourneert geen gegevens van de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>gebeurtenis.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>

trans-unit.source: It is provided to enable application authors to write event handlers for the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> event.
trans-unit.target: Dit wordt geleverd om in te schakelen auteurs van toepassingen schrijven gebeurtenis-handlers voor de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>gebeurtenis.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>
